p:
We assumed the number of effective daily contacts per infected person was 5 (i.e. λ = 5), according to the estimation by Kucharski [ 9]. According to Chinese statistics, the average length of hospitalization was 20 days in Wuhan city and 9 days outside Hubei, so the average length of hospitalization was
⌊
20 + 9
2
⌋ = 14
days. μ ( Mu) is defined as recovery rate and thus, μ ( Mu) = 1/14. Because the first case was found on December 8, 2019, the value of “ t” was the difference between that date and the given date.
